Tshediso John Matona bụ onye ọrụ obodo South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Eskom.

Matona gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town na nzere na Economics na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na Mahadum nke East Anglia na Masters na Development Economics. Ọ bụbu Director General nke Ngalaba nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọha, na Director General nke Ngalaba Azụmahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ.
